text: Geoffrey Brissaud (born 23 March 1998) is a French ice dancer. With his former skating partner, Sarah-Marine Rouffanche, he competed at the 2015 World Junior Championships in Tallinn, Estonia. They qualified for the free dance and finished 15th overall. == Programs == === With Lopareva === {|class=wikitable style=text-align:center ! Season ! Rhythm dance !
